Series.Actors: |Beth Behrs|Kat Dennings|Matthew Moy|Garrett Morris|Jonathan Kite|Jennifer Coolidge|Eric André|Nick Zano|
Series.Overview: A lot of girls move to New York City to "make it". Max and Caroline are just trying to make their rent. In this fun, outrageous comedy series, two girls from very different backgrounds – Max, poor from birth, and Caroline, born wealthy but down on her luck – wind up as waitresses in the same colorful Brooklyn diner and strike up an unlikely friendship that could lead to a successful business venture. All they need to do is come up with $250,000 in start-up expenses. "2 Broke Girls" infuses the classic comedy with something new, current and young, proving life can be fun – even if you’re broke.

Episode.GuestStars: |Brooke Lyons|Noah Mills|Shoshana Bush|Cale Hartmann|Adam Korson|Alex Enriquez|Matt Cook|Bill Parks|Eugene Shaw|Sergey Brusilovsky|Greg Lewis|Cocoa Brown|Nick Jameson|
Episode.Overview: Experienced waitress Max Black meets her new co-worker, former rich-girl Caroline Channing, and puts her skills to the test at an old but re-emerging Brooklyn diner. Despite her initial distaste for Caroline, Max eventually softens and the two team up for a new business venture.

Episode.GuestStars: Brooke Lyons|Noah Mills|Paxton West McMurray|Halston Autumn McMurray|Lauren Benz Phillips|Dana Delorenzo
Episode.Overview:
Thinking she is being helpful, Caroline facilitates Max's breakup with Robbie.
Recap: Max and Caroline are living with one another and they are going through some issues with boundaries. Caroline simply does not have any, while Max has many that Caroline needs to respect. Max has made amazingly delicious cupcakes and Caroline would really like to also have her name included on the product. Max is really not into that idea. Not only that, but Caroline thinks that Max is trying to hide her feelings about the Robbie situation from her.
She thinks that she should be honest and open about it. Max is not the kind of girl that opens up easily, which of course instigates sarcasm and a serious attitude.
Caroline is using Max’s bed to sleep in now, along with Max. She learns that Max sleeps with a knife. Robbie shows up in bed with the both of them, because he doesn’t seem to get that they are broken up. He also talks about the fact that it would be fantastic if they could have a threesome, since they’re all there anyway. By trying to defend Max, Caroline ends up “breaking up” with Robbie. She gives him his belongings and tells him off. Max is not happy about this, because that is really all Max had. She wanted to give him his stuff back and tell him off with her quick wit and sharp tongue. She needed that closure and she wasn’t given that.
Due to the fact that Max was not happy about that, Caroline ends up doing the same thing to Max, because she’s tired of the boundary issues and Max also used Caroline’s father as a weapon. Caroline leaves and inevitably comes back completely trashed and apologizes. Max apologizes to her for what she said and admits that she overreacted about the sign for the cupcake business.

Episode.GuestStars: Nick Zano|Baadja-Lyne Odums|Amaris Dupree|Sarah Buehler|Brooke Dillman|Craig Frank|Thomas Fowler|Chuti Tiu
Episode.Overview: Max introduces Caroline to the art of thrift store shopping, which takes a dangerous turn when a battle erupts over a T-shirt.

Episode.GuestStars: Bunny Levine|Mike Moh|Rick Shapiro|Kenji Nakamura|Masashi Odate|Henry Hayashi|Lorin McCraley
Episode.Overview: Caroline asks Max to help her break into her former townhouse to retrieve her much-needed night guard.

Episode.GuestStars: Travis Van Winkle|Kate Frisbee|Nik Tyler|Chad Jamian Williams|Ryan Gaul|Phong Lee|Blake Young-Fountain|Kent A. Phillips
Episode.Overview: Caroline and Max throw a '90s-themed party at the diner to attract rich hipsters and raise money for their cupcake business; Caroline is horrified when her rich ex-boyfriend comes into the diner.

Episode.GuestStars: ri Zagaris|Janelle Giumarra|Marty Thomas|Anthony Cutolo|David Hoffman|Janelle Marra
Episode.Overview: Caroline and Max try to install a Murphy bed in their apartment.

Episode.GuestStars: Carla Gallo|Jade Catta-Preta|Norma Micheals|Bunny Levine|Cynthia Frost|Mary Jo Catlett|Megan Heyn|Giancarlo Carmona|Brian Gross|Greg Worswick|Marcus Choi|Dan Wells|Beth Crosby|Jennifer Jean Snyder
Episode.Overview: Caroline persuades Max to take a cupcake-decorating class.

Episode.GuestStars: Marsha Thomason|Eddie Pepitone|Myra McWethy
Episode.Overview: The two take a job cleaning a hoarder's apartment for the extra money; Max learns that Johnny has a secret.

Episode.GuestStars: Marsha Thomason|Miki Ann Maddox|Gary Kraus|Alex Berg
Episode.Overview: Johnny's girlfriend has a devious plan in mind when she hires Max and Caroline to bake cupcakes for an art show featuring his work.

Episode.GuestStars: Mindy Sterling|Katierose Donohue|Ian Sturdevant|Jane Widdop|Chase McKentry|Jake Madden|Josh Winot|Nick Fouquet
Episode.Overview: Caroline and Max spend Caroline's first broke holiday season working at a department store's Santaland to earn extra money.

Episode.GuestStars: Nick Clifford|Jimmy Shubert
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline try to find Chestnut a job in order to get him lodging for the winter. Meanwhile, Peach, the mother of the twins Max babysits, auditions for "Real Housewives of TriBeCa".

Episode.GuestStars: Mitch Silpa|Dale Dickey|Brittany Finamore|Annet Mahendru|Laura Spencer|Rose Abdoo|Brian Thompson
Episode.Overview: When Max's stove breaks, Caroline tries to return some expensive rings to Barney's department store, but discovers her surname is no longer an asset at her former home away from home.

Episode.GuestStars: Sonya Eddie|Chauntae Pink|Fay Wolf|Ian Wolterstorff|Jimmy Ouyang
Episode.Overview: Caroline discovers the secret ingredient to Max's cupcakes whilst in the midst of her new obsession couponing.

Episode.GuestStars: Jennifer Coolidge|Lou Dimaggio|Mike Pfaf|Alan Wasserman
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline's new neighbor draws their suspicion.

Episode.GuestStars: Jennifer Coolidge|Brad Grunberg|Joey Baker
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline try to prove their cleaning skills to Sophie so she will hire them for her maid service.

Episode.GuestStars: Jennifer Coolidge|Lou Dimaggio|Mike Pfaf|Alan Wasserman
Episode.Overview: When Sophie's (Jennifer Coolidge) beauty overwhelms Earl, Caroline and Max wind up spending Valentine's Day at the hospital; Caroline tries to rekindle an old flame.

Episode.GuestStars: Mary Testa|River Alexander|Jake Elliott|Renee Taylor|Matt Winston|Jay Willick
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline have to make kosher cupcakes when they get a gig at a bar mitzvah.

Episode.GuestStars: Bridget Everett|Tim Chiou|Brian Robinson|Jeremy Rowley|Dan Warner|Hal Devi
Episode.Overview: Max runs into an old boyfriend, when she accompanies Caroline to see her father in jail.

Episode.GuestStars: Riley Smith|Jayson Blair|Kevin Berntson|Alison White
Episode.Overview: Caroline and Max spend their spring break dog-sitting at a couple's lavish apartment.

Episode.GuestStars: Josh Pais|Jordan Black|D.C. Douglas|Morgan Murphy|Courtney Pauroso|Corey Podell
Episode.Overview: Max convinces Caroline to partake in a clinical drug trial in an effort to raise money to help Caroline’s father.

Episode.GuestStars: J.R. Nutt|Dustin Coffey|Cecelia Antoinette|Michelle Noh|Daniel E. Mora|Sean Moran
Episode.Overview: After promising Earl to drop his tax return in the mail, Caroline learns that Max has never filed, and gets sidetracked trying to help her.

Episode.GuestStars: Ayda Field|Annie Baria|Richard Gleason|Tracy Vilar|Amol Shah|Rico E. Anderson|Josh Breeding|Christina Jeffs
Episode.Overview: The stakes are high when a socialite Manhattan mother hires Max and Caroline to serve cupcakes at her daughter's first birthday party.

Episode.EpisodeName: And Martha Stewart Have a Ball (1)
Episode.GuestStars: Martha Stewart|Dana Powell
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline plan to attend a big fashion gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art where Martha Stewart is scheduled to be a guest, in an attempt to have her taste their cupcakes and get her seal of approval.

Episode.EpisodeName: And Martha Stewart Have a Ball (2)
Episode.GuestStars: Dana Powell
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline plan to attend a big fashion gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art where Martha Stewart is scheduled to be a guest, in an attempt to have her taste their cupcakes and get her seal of approval.

Episode.GuestStars: Steven Weber|Robert Michael Morris|Ajay Mehta|Brian Palermo|Gary Kraus|Kevin D'Arcy|Ursula Burton|Dashiell Henry Burton|Tom Virtue|Carrie Armstrong
Episode.Overview: Max joins Caroline on her visit to a white collar prison to see her father, Martin Channing, and he encourages them to purchase a particular keepsake at the Channing estate auction.

Episode.GuestStars: Allison Dunbar|Laura Everly|Angela Giarratana|Angela De Silva|Jona Xiao|Isidora Goreshter|Josh Latzer
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline attempt to keep faith that Martha Stewart, who tasted and liked one of their cupcakes in last season's finale, will call and help support their business. Meanwhile, Caroline loses a lucky keepsake.

Episode.GuestStars: D.J. Pierce|Mando Alvarado|Tom Christensen|Damon Stone|Travis Lindquist|Jackson Rogow|Michael Cohen|James Grabowski
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline show their true colors when the diner gets robbed. Meanwhile, everyone sees a surprising new side of Han.

Episode.GuestStars: Frances Callier|Mary Pat Gleason|Edi Patterson
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline try to take their cupcake business to the next level by auditioning for the reality cooking show Cupcake Wars.
Max and Caroline have different ideas on how to handle their new pre-approved credit card.
The attractive owner of a local candy store is sweet on Caroline, but she's too embarrassed to date him after she had a mishap in the store.

Episode.EpisodeName: And the Three Boys with Wood
Episode.Overview: Caroline and Max ask two Amish boys to build a barn for Chestnut; Andy makes a discovery about Caroline.

Max and Caroline figure out a surprising fundraising solution when a potential storefront for Max's Homemade Cupcake becomes available for the girls to rent as the two go to great lengths to raise enough money to see their dream come true.

Episode.GuestStars: Natalie Cohen|Abby Elliott|Katie Molinaro|Chelsea O'Toole|Sharon Sachs
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline decide to hire an intern to help take care of some of the menial tasks involved with the preparation for opening their new cupcake shop, but Max seems conflicted with her new managerial role as the boss

Episode.GuestStars: Ryan Hansen|Brandon Herman|Noah Mills|Darryl Stephens|Amy Tolsky|Nick Zano|Shawn Ashley
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline host a grand opening celebration at their new cupcake shop, and Max invites her former flames to show off her success.

Episode.GuestStars: Ryan Hansen|James Hong|Bianca Lawson|Tom Massmann|Noah Mills|Connie Sawyer|Nick Zano|Shawn Ashley
Episode.Overview: When Max sees Sophie depressed after being swindled by the contractor in charge of building her dream house, she offers to make her a silent partner in the cupcake business, but Caroline and Sophie have very different visions for the company.

Episode.GuestStars: David Douglas|Ryan Hansen|Rob Kerkovich|Christine Moore|Mick Page|Frances Shaw|Robb Skyler|Patrick Robert Smith|Amy Tolsky
Episode.Overview: Desperate for a way to pay their overdue rent, Max and Caroline get involved with a group of of sketchy customers willing to pay top dollar for their cupcakes.

Episode.GuestStars: Craig Anton|Michael Dunn|Ryan Hansen|Jeff Howard|Stephanie Ray|Stacie Theon
Episode.Overview: A relaxing getaway for two becomes an awkward vacation for three when Max, Caroline and Andy spend a weekend together in a cabin in the woods.

Episode.GuestStars: Ryan Hansen|Jae Jung|Barret Swatek
Episode.Overview: The diner gang helps Max and Caroline bake throughout the night in order to fulfill a gigantic cupcake order.

Episode.GuestStars: Caroline Aaron|Amir Talai|Joe Lorenzo|Fawn Irish|Allan Rich|Eddie Alfano
Episode.Overview: After learning that Candy Andy closed down his shop after their breakup, Caroline visits a psychic for a reading about her love life in the future.

Episode.GuestStars: 2 Chainz|Adam Campbell|Carole Davis|Will Deutsch|Matt Nolan|Brian Palermo
Episode.Overview: When Max lands tickets to a music awards show in Los Angeles, she and Caroline meet rapper 2 Chainz during the cross-country flight on a private jet.

Episode.GuestStars: Andy Dick|Ari Herstand|Nick Josephs|Brice Williams
Episode.Overview: Caroline and Max pay a steep price for trying to remove a street performer from the entry of their shop.

Episode.GuestStars: Deanne Bray|Laura Clery|Rod Keller|Missi Pyle
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline ask Caroline's rich but callous aunt for money to save their flailing cupcake shop.

Episode.GuestStars: Debra Wilson|Marc Evan Jackson|Ernie Grunwald|Elizabeth Ho|Kendal Rae|Karen Rizzo
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline take office temp jobs. While Caroline tries to climb the corporate ladder, Max deals with a boss who makes inappropriate advances.

Episode.GuestStars: Tage Dyment Eriksen
Episode.Overview: Han fires Caroline when she insults his diner, so Max tries to mend their relationship.

Episode.GuestStars: Rebecca Burchett|Ryan Hansen|Kimberly Pfeffer|Aaron Scotti|Kym Whitley
Episode.Overview: Caroline is in a tizzy when she develops a rash after a romantic evening with her former boyfriend.

Episode.GuestStars: Kyle Gass|Tom Parker|Eddie Shin
Episode.Overview: Max and Caroline are invited to be extras on a popular TV show shooting a scene in Han’s diner, but when Caroline catches the director’s eye, he offers her an actual role – with strings attached.

Episode.GuestStars: Anastasia Basil|Dawn Drake|Gary Kraus|Beth Lacke|Piers Morgan|Steven Weber
Episode.Overview: Caroline’s father asks her to go on a talk show to defend him when a former employee threatens to defame him in a tell-all book.

Episode.GuestStars: Tim Bagley|Jennifer Elise Cox|Bonnie Hellman|James Pumphrey
Episode.Overview: When Max and Caroline offer to deep-clean a previously hidden part of the diner they discover something that could relaunch their cupcake business.

Episode.GuestStars: Eric Tiede|Darren Darnborough|Brian Lee Franklin|Liz Carey|Cody Chappel|Leana Chavez|Michael Earl Reid|David Angelo
Episode.Overview: Word about a shocking incident involving a celebrity brings customers to Max and Caroline's new cupcake window.

Episode.GuestStars: Misty Monroe|Julia Cho|Irene Choi|Craig Ramsay|Deborah Levin|
Episode.Overview: Caroline tries to raise money for an expensive pair of new pants through an online fundraising site. Meanwhile, Max’s new smartphone comes between her and Caroline.

Episode.EpisodeName: And the Kitty Kitty Spank Spank
Episode.GuestStars: Crista Flanagan|Nadia Bjorlin|Jeff Ellingson
Episode.Overview: When Max becomes smitten with an old stray cat that's been hanging around the apartment, Caroline tries to convince her they need to find it a better home. But just when they think they've found one, the cat's fate takes a turn.

Episode.GuestStars: Federico Dordei|Jeff Galante|Alex Alexander|Sachin Bhatt|Jim Hoffmaster|Marisa Chen Moller|April Hall|Adam Lustick
Episode.Overview: When Max and Caroline can’t figure out how to use the new cappuccino maker they bought for their cupcake business, they take temporary side jobs as baristas at a coffee house to learn the ropes.

Episode.GuestStars: Judy Gold|Bob Glouberman|Tony Cavalery|Nika Williams|John Maholm|Patrick O’Neil|Adam Jefferis|Lila Lucchetti|Jennie Pierson
Episode.Overview: When Max and Caroline start losing business to the new cronut craze (half-croissant, half-donut), they come up with their own trend – cake fries.

Episode.GuestStars: Federico Dordei|Derek Krantz|Michael Earl Reid
Episode.Overview: Feeling guilty for buying hair extensions with their joint funds, Caroline splurges on a new bedding set for Max but gives the old one to charity, not realizing her old pillowcase has sentimental value.

Episode.GuestStars: Karen Maruyama|Ally Maki|Mike Grief|Daryl Crittenden
Episode.Overview: After Han emails photos of a stripper’s face to his mother claiming she’s his girlfriend, he begs Max and Caroline to find her and convince her to play his girlfriend when his mother arrives from Korea.

Episode.GuestStars: Federico Dordei|Amy Paffrath|Alex Staggs|Pamala Tyson |Craig Ramsay|Tye Edwards
Episode.Overview: When Caroline’s date is a no-show after promising to take her to one of the city’s hippest new restaurants, she and Max decide to take advantage of the hard-to-get reservation.

Episode.GuestStars: Gilles Marini|Mary Lynn Rajskub|Natalija Nogulich
Episode.Overview: Max decides to apply to the Manhattan School of Pastry and bakes a tart for her entrance exam.

Episode.EpisodeName: And the First Day of School
Episode.GuestStars: Federico Dordei|Gilles Marini|Mary Lynn Rajskub|Eric Andre|Patrick Cox
Episode.Overview: Max attempts to make a good impression on her first day of pastry school, but finds the class clown to be extremely distracting – and intriguing. Meanwhile, Caroline dresses to impress Max’s handsome teacher, Nicolas.

Episode.GuestStars: |Anne De Salvo|Jill Basey|Giovanni Bejarano|Linda Porter|Donna Pieroni|Jack Impellizzeri|Federico Dordei|Mary Lynn Rajskub|
Episode.Overview: Caroline attends her former nanny’s funeral, thinking the family will be honored to have her, but quickly finds out they have no idea who she is.

Episode.GuestStars: |Dawn Drake|Federico Dordei|Eric Andre|Gilles Marini|Mary Lynn Rajskub|Patrick Cox|
Episode.Overview: After an incredible make-out session with Max’s pastry school teacher, Chef Nicholas, Caroline finds out something that makes her wish it never happened.
Max finds herself wanting to be more than just friends with her pastry school partner, Deke. Meanwhile, Caroline is "hot for teacher" - the married Chef Nicholas.

When Deke takes Max to his place after a great first date, his "home" is nothing like she expected. Meanwhile, Caroline feels empowered - then scared for her life - after having a shady car towed from the front of their apartment building.

Episode.EpisodeName: And the Icing On the Cake
Episode.Overview: When Deke invites Max’s friends over for a gathering at his dumpster, Caroline learns an enormous secret about his background.

Episode.GuestStars: Federico Dordei; Eric Andre; Patrick Cox
Episode.Overview: Max decides to break up with Deke now that she knows about his wealthy background.

Caroline asks Max and Deke to join her on her dinner date at Nicolas’s loft to help make sure she doesn’t do anything she might regret. Also, Max and Caroline treat themselves to very special hair appointments.
Caroline goes into a tailspin and brings Max into the mix when Nicolas tells her he's going to leave his wife for her.

Caroline tries to fit in with Max and the diner gang as they go out to get wild and crazy at the St. Patrick's Day parade, but finds herself longing to practice her former holiday traditions at the Plaza Hotel.
